name: 路德维希·玻尔兹曼
bio_short: 奥地利物理学家和数学家，统计力学的奠基人。他将宏观的热力学定律与微观的原子运动联系起来，提出了著名的熵公式 S=klogW，彻底改变了物理学对不可逆过程的理解。
bio_short_en: An Austrian physicist and mathematician, the founding father of statistical mechanics. He bridged macroscopic thermodynamics with microscopic atomic motion and formulated the famous entropy equation S=klogW, revolutionizing the understanding of irreversible processes.
